short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out how low your chapter 13 payment could be.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension will allow you to quickly access the Chapter 13 payment calculator at https://www.debtfreeohio.com.  When you are trying to determine how much you will save on your monthly bills by filing chapter 13 bankruptcy, this program will assist you by allowing you to quickly determine the monthly  bankruptcy plan payment for different amounts of debt.  For example, if you are thinking of replacing a car before filing, and want to know how much your plan payment will be for several different car loan amounts, this calculator will quickly tell you the estimated plan payment.
